title: Kinkyuu Hasshin Saver Kids (Emergency Departure Rescue Kids)
synopsis: Matsugorou is a vile doctor who plots out a plan to take over the world by commanding his own robotic army. The only chance the world has is a group of three brothers that make up a team called the Emergency Departure Saver Kids.
characters: ['Tenjinbayashi, Ken', 'Tenjinbayashi, Umeko', 'Tenjinbayashi, Takeo', 'Stanley, Haruka', 'Tenjinbayashi, Matsugorou', 'Tenjinbayashi, Gou', 'Dr. Bug', 'Epsilon', 'Omega', 'Tenjinbayashi, Ran']
